name: A very bad day (ldahleen54, InsaneXArtist, Knobody)
name_original: A very bad day (ldahleen54, InsaneXArtist, Knobody)
description:
Help James find his way to the sacred springs amidst all the teleporting chaos 

Do your best to follow the music to stay on the right path! Some portals will lead you astray others are always reliable. It's up to you to find the right ones.

Arrow Keys - movement

Space to select on menu

any issues are not bugs they are just features    ; )

Programmer: Luke Dahleen

Game/ Level Design: Eric Dahleen

Sound Design: Gavin Rose

Game Art: Sam Lock
